group_contents.title: The Edge
group_contents.desc:
Sport and Physical Activity

Visit website

0113 343 5095

Term time opening hours
Monday-Friday 8.00am-9.00pm

State of the art fitness centre with facilities including:
  • 25 meter, 8 lane swimming pool
  • 250 station fitness suite with designated weights training room
  • 3 Fitness studios to cater for up to 150 classes per week
  • 2 Sports Halls (comprising of 12 badminton courts)
  • 2 Squash Courts
  • Climbing and Bouldering Wall
